client

Class ClientGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientGUI

  • public class ClientGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Displays the client window with the battleship grids and chat panel.
    Author:
    Jean

        private boolean checkShips()
        Checks if all of the opponent's ships have been destroyed
        Returns:
        true if the all ships are destroyed

      • endOfGame

        public void endOfGame()
        Executes when a player has won and prompts the user if they want to play again

      • addOpponentGrid

        public void addOpponentGrid()
        Receives the opponents grid coordinates and adds them to the window. Listeners are added to buttons so that color changes when user clicks on them.

      • addOpponentShips

        public void addOpponentShips()
        Receives list of where the opponent ships are and stores them.

      • makeShips

        public void makeShips()
        Places all the ships needed for a standard battleship game on the grid.

      • placeShips

        private boolean placeShips(int numberOfParts,
                           java.lang.String shipType)
        Places each ship on the grid randomly
        Parameters:
        numberOfParts - number of squares the ship occupies
        shipType - type of ship being placed
        Returns:
        true if the ships is successfully made

      • display

        public void display()
        Displays whole window with all the panels.
